analyzed: @215b * // thig gdab pa'i cho ga dka' ba spyod pa bzhugs /

analyzed: # // 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas pa la //

translated: In a square ma·πá·∏çala,

original: zur thig phyogs thig mnyam par gdab //
analyzed: zur thig phyogs thig mnyam par gdab //
translated: the corner lines and the directional lines are evenly set.

original: cha chen nyi shu'i tshad du bya ;
analyzed: cha chen nyi shu'i tshad du bya ;
translated: The measure is made with twenty major parts.

original: / bdun pa'i thig ni gzhag par bya //
analyzed: / bdun pa'i thig ni gzhag par bya //
translated: The line of the seventh [part] is set.

original: de nas cha bran bgo ba ni //
analyzed: de nas cha bran bgo ba ni //
translated: Then, the minor parts are distributed.

original: tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis kyi //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis kyi //
translated: On both sides of the line of BrahmƒÅ,

original: cha chen dang po phyed du bgo / phyi yi cha chen de bzhin bgo / cha chan gnyis pa phyed du bya //
analyzed: cha chen dang po phyed du bgo / phyi yi cha chen de bzhin bgo / cha chan gnyis pa phyed du bya //
translated: the first major part is divided in half. The outer major part is likewise divided. The second major part is divided in half.

original: nang gi cha phyed de bzhin bgo / cha chen lnga pa phyi nang gi / cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis gzhag / cha chen drug pa phyed du bya //
analyzed: nang gi cha phyed de bzhin bgo / cha chen lnga pa phyi nang gi / cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis gzhag / cha chen drug pa phyed du bya //
translated: The inner half part is likewise divided. The fifth major part is divided into outer and inner parts, leaving the two middle [parts]. The sixth major part is divided in half.

original: de nas thig skor bya ba ni //
analyzed: de nas thig skor bya ba ni //
translated: Then, the circumambulation lines are drawn.

original: cha chen bcu pa'i phyed las bskor //
analyzed: cha chen bcu pa'i phyed las bskor //
translated: The circumambulation is done from the half of the tenth major part.

original: cha chen dgu dang cha chen brgyad //
analyzed: cha chen dgu dang cha chen brgyad //
translated: The ninth major part and the eighth major part

original: gnyis ka'i mtha' nas bskor bar bya //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i mtha' nas bskor bar bya //
translated: are circumambulated from the two ends.

original: cha chen gsum las mtha' yi ni //
analyzed: cha chen gsum las mtha' yi ni //
translated: From the third major part, the end

original: cha chung gcig las bskor bar bya //
analyzed: cha chung gcig las bskor bar bya //
translated: One should draw a circle one cubit in size.üîΩThe other outer and inner circles

original: de las gzhan pa phyi nang gi / bskor ba rgyud kyi gzhung gis so //üîΩsgo gnyis pa la sogs pa dang // rgyud gzhung gi ni rnam dbye yis //

translated: are drawn according to the texts of the tantras.üîΩOne should subtract or add partsüîΩaccording to the two doors and so forth

original: cha rnams dbri dang bsnan par bya //
